solution_line_template: Luther has {silk_pieces} / {half_divisor} = <<{silk_pieces}/{half_divisor}={cashmere_pieces}>>{cashmere_pieces} pieces made with cashmere.
He has {total_pieces_line} - {silk_pieces} = <<{total_pieces_line}-{silk_pieces}={pieces_only_cashmere}>>{pieces_only_cashmere} pieces made without silk using only cashmere.
Thus, Luther has {cashmere_pieces} - {pieces_only_cashmere} = <<{cashmere_pieces}-{pieces_only_cashmere}={blend_pieces}>>{blend_pieces} pieces made using a blend of cashmere and silk.
